name: Population & Infrastructure
desc: The basic infrastructure required to support a given population, from rickety orbital hab-modules to megacities and everything between.

name: Robotic Worker Manufactory
desc: A facility producing utility robots. Provides a small amount of population growth to robotic population

name: Robot Worker Factory
desc: A large facility designed to produce utility robots en masse. Provides a boost to population growth divided between all friendly robotic population worlds in the system.

name: Robot Worker Production Center
desc: A massive production facility designed to produce immense amounts of utility robots. Provides a large amount of population growth divided between all same faction robotic population markets in the sector.

name: AI Node Production Facility
desc: A facility that produces Sub Command Nodes, Command Nodes and Command Relays. Critical components used to control a robotic population. Also adds a market were you may create Command Nodes of varying quality.

name: Robotic Maintenance Facility
desc: A facility that produces Maintenance Parts for robotic workers and possesses additional repair facilities for even the most severe damage a robotic unit can sustain.

name: Synthetic Production Center
desc: A rigorous process of producing a skin-like substance, layered over a robot frame with a mix of mock - and real - organs installed. Almost 90% of robots created from this factory fail to meet the required criteria and are recycled.

name: AI-Retrofitted Shipyard
desc: A building that allows ships to be upgraded with a zero op cost permanent AI Retrofit hullmod. removes any other AI Retrofit hullmod when the upgrade is complete. Even ones that are otherwise permanently installed. Applies this bonus to all fleets launched from this world

name: Salvage Robot Manufactory
desc: A factory that produces Salvage Robots. Produces a small number of Salvage Robots for personal use every month

name: Survey Robot Manufactory
desc: A factory that produces Survey Robots. Produces a small number of Survey Robots for personal use every month

name: Combat Robot Manufactory
desc: A factory that produces Combat Robots. Produces a small number of Combat Robots for personal use every month

name: Salvage Robot Factory
desc: A massive factory that produces Salvage Robots on a industrial scale. Produces a large number of Salvage Robots for personal use every month

name: Survey Robot Factory
desc: A massive factory that produces Survey Robots on a industrial scale. Produces a large number of Survey Robots for personal use every month

name: Combat Robot Factory
desc: A massive factory that produces Combat Robots on a industrial scale. Produces a large number of Combat Robots for personal use every month

name: Population Replacement Center
desc: Replace the colony's human population with a robotic population, or its robotic population with human colonists. Removes itself upon completion. If built within a short time after founding a market, takes a single day to complete

name: for building a thing for a thing please dont ask it was someone else
